meanings.sent1: The unfearful child confidently approached the unfamiliar dog.
meanings.sent2: She felt unfearful when walking alone in the dark.
meanings.sent3: The unfearful squirrel fearlessly stole nuts from the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: His unfearful attitude in the face of danger inspired others.
meanings.sent5: The unfearful knight fearlessly fought the dragon to protect the village.

meanings.sent1: The unfearful firefighter rushed into the burning building to save the family.
meanings.sent2: Her unfearful actions during the crisis saved many lives.
meanings.sent3: The unfearful superhero fearlessly faced the villain's wrath.
meanings.sent4: His unfearful determination to succeed motivated his teammates.
meanings.sent5: The unfearful soldier bravely charged into battle without hesitation.

meanings.sent1: She unfearfully jumped off the diving board into the pool.
meanings.sent2: He unfearfully confronted his fears and overcame them.
meanings.sent3: The cat unfearfully chased the mouse around the house.
meanings.sent4: The explorer unfearfully ventured into the unknown jungle.
meanings.sent5: The student unfearfully raised her hand to answer the question in class.
